name: Aspirin
effect: Aspirin helps reduce the risk of heart attacks by preventing blood clots from forming.

name: Beta-Blockers
effect: Beta-blockers reduce the heart rate and blood pressure, easing the heart's workload.

name: Nitroglycerin
effect: Nitroglycerin dilates blood vessels to relieve chest pain (angina) by improving blood flow to the heart.

name: Statins
effect: Statins lower cholesterol levels, which helps prevent plaque buildup in the arteries and reduces the risk of heart disease.

name: ACE Inhibitors
effect: ACE inhibitors relax blood vessels, lowering blood pressure and reducing strain on the heart.

name: Diuretics
effect: Diuretics help reduce fluid buildup in the body, which can alleviate symptoms of heart failure.

name: Calcium Channel Blockers
effect: Calcium channel blockers relax and widen blood vessels, lowering blood pressure and reducing the heart's workload.

name: Warfarin
effect: Warfarin is a blood thinner that prevents blood clots, reducing the risk of stroke and heart attack.

name: Clopidogrel
effect: Clopidogrel helps prevent blood clots by inhibiting platelets from sticking together, often used after heart attacks or surgeries.

name: ARBs
effect: ARBs, Angiotensin II receptor blockers, block the action of a hormone that constricts blood vessels, helping to lower blood pressure and reduce the risk of heart failure.

name: Eplerenone
effect: Eplerenone helps reduce blood pressure and prevent heart failure symptoms by blocking a hormone that causes fluid retention.

name: Furosemide
effect: Furosemide is a diuretic that helps remove excess fluid from the body, which can relieve symptoms of heart failure and hypertension.

name: Hydralazine
effect: Hydralazine works by relaxing the blood vessels, helping to lower blood pressure and reduce the heart's workload.

name: Digoxin
effect: Digoxin increases the strength and efficiency of the heart's contractions, often used in heart failure and arrhythmias.

name: Ivabradine
effect: Ivabradine slows the heart rate, helping people with heart failure by reducing the heart's workload and improving its pumping efficiency.

name: Ranolazine
effect: Ranolazine helps treat chronic angina by improving blood flow to the heart and reducing pain during physical exertion.

name: Lisinopril
effect: Lisinopril is an ACE inhibitor that lowers blood pressure, improves heart function, and helps prevent heart failure progression.

name: Verapamil
effect: Verapamil is a calcium channel blocker that relaxes blood vessels and slows the heart rate, used in managing high blood pressure and certain arrhythmias.

name: Amiodarone
effect: Amiodarone is used to treat arrhythmias by helping to regulate the heart's rhythm, often used in life-threatening cases.

name: Losartan
effect: Losartan is an ARB that helps lower blood pressure and reduce the risk of strokes, kidney disease, and heart failure progression.
